remarks: Absorption law for multiplication with an infinite cardinal.  Equivalent to Proposition 10.41 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 95.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
statement: infxp $p |- ( ( ( A e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ A ) /\ ( B e. dom card /\ B =/= (/) ) ) -> ( A X. B ) ~~ ( A u. B ) ) $.
